hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdul-Malik bin 'Umair that he heard 'Abdur-Rahman bin Abu Bakrah (narrate) from his father that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Let the judge (Qadi) not pass a judgment when he is angry.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَحْكُمُ الْحَاكِمُ وَهُوَ غَضْبَانُ
chapter.eng-name: The judge Should Not Pass A Judgment When He Is Angry
